product.name: ANIMAL CUTS
product.description: Cardio sucks. There’s no beauty or grace in it. You’re not moving huge weight. It’s just painful. But you do it because you have to–a necessary evil. Whether you’re preparing for a show or just trying to get in top condition, you could benefit from the raw power of Animal Cuts. Make no mistake about it, Animal Cuts is unlike anything out there. It’s an uncompromising cutting supplement that has been designed to produce professional results for bodybuilding competitions. Unlike most conventional, so-called fat burners out there, Animal Cuts is more different. It is a comprehensive and complete formula. Take a look at the leading fat burner. If you’re depending on this type of one dimensional product, you may be getting less than ideal results. Maybe you drink a lot of coffee in the morning and soda throughout the day. In this case and others, the human body may become desensitized to the ingredients in this stack after prolonged use, thus reducing its effectiveness. For some athletes, the problem may even transcend this. Your problem, for instance, might be releasing stored bodyfat or supporting your body’s metabolism. The point is, athletes need to overcome many obstacles in order to achieve maximum cuts and separations. So if you’ve had little success with conventional fat burners in the past, or if results have stopped coming, then don’t be frustrated. It might be that you simply chose the wrong product. Only Animal Cuts is designed to support all of your weight-loss and definition needs. Animal Cuts is comprehensive – each convenient pack delivers 29 different ingredients. Every day, for 21 consecutive days, you’ll get over 4,000 milligrams of pure fat shredding support. If you’re competing tomorrow, then you may want to try Animal Cuts today.

related_products.name: ANIMAL ANIMAL ENERGY
related_products.description: Whether you’re training 1-2 hours and need to be at your peak or just need a pick-me-up on off days to get things done, you may need a lift every now and then. For those times when you need clean energy, enhanced focus and mood without a crash, check out Animal Energy. With its convenient 1-capsule dose, Animal Energy is simple to use yet powerful. Animal Energy’s unique 2-Stage delivery system provides both quick and lasting effects. This product can help you when you need to be strong and help push you through days that feel long.

related_products.name: ANIMAL PAK 369G
related_products.description: All of the potent power of the world’s number one bodybuilding multi, in convenient, great-tasting powder! Since August 8, 1983, Animal Pak has been helping competitive bodybuilders get the most out of their freakish training routines by providing all the nutrition they need, plus some they didn’t know they needed. For 30+ years, people like you have made Animal Pak the #1 selling training “pack” in the world. In fact, more competitive bodybuilders have cut their teeth on the Animal Pak than any other bodybuilding supplement in history. Why? Simple. Animal Pak gets the job done. It works. First time. Every time. Animal Pak has stood the test of time and it will work for you.

related_products.name: BPI SPORTS A-HD ELITE
related_products.description: A-HD Elite is formulated as a testosterone supporting agent designed to promote testosterone levels and muscularity. The unique ingredient profile of A-HD Eliteis designed to support a healthy anabolic state. A-HD Elitemay assist you in performing at the top of your ability leading to more strength, power and lean muscle gains in the gym to help you build the dream physique you’ve always imagined. A-HD Elite -elevate your game in the gym.

related_products.name: BPI SPORTS CLA + L CARNITINE 300G
related_products.description: CLA and L- Carnitine are two popular ingredients that have been clinically studied for their effects on weight management. They may work synergistically to help you achieve your goals.

related_products.name: BPI SPORTS ROXYLEAN
related_products.description: ROXYLEAN is the ONE. This weight loss support product was scientifically designed for those looking for extreme effectiveness. This one-pill-a-day product combines the highest-quality, most effective ingredients to support energy and battle fatigue. No need to worry about the crash or jitters, ROXYLEAN was created to provide sustained energy. If you’re looking for great results… ROXYLEAN IS THE ANSWER!

related_products.name: BSN AMINO X 1015G
related_products.description: Over the years, BSN has supplied the supplement world with a host of novel muscle-building products. In their undying quest to bring exciting and innovative products to the marketplace, they have developed the newest supplement breakthrough with BSN’s highly-anticipated entry into the branched-chain amino acid market with Amino X – the first Effervescent Instantized BCAA Endurance and Recovery Agent. Amino X is designed to support: Protein Synthesis / Anabolism Glycogen Resynthesis Insulin Sensitivity Anti-Catabolism / Muscle Sparing Recovery from Training Sessions Muscular Endurance Resistance to Muscular Fatigue

related_products.name: BSN BCAA DNA
related_products.description: The amino acids leucine, isoleucine and valine are commonly grouped together and referred to as branched chain amino acids, or BCAAs, in reference to their chemical structure. These are essential amino acids, which means the body does not synthesise them naturally, and so they must be consumed through diet or supplements. BCAAs are metabolised in skeletal muscle, and so they are integral to muscle development and repair. BSN BCAA DNA is the ideal formula to support your training. Product Highlights BSN BCAA DNA provides 5g of BCAAs per serving. An instantised blend of leucine, isoleucine and valine in a 2:1:1 ratio – the fractions of which have been supported by scientific research. Available as an unflavoured powder, which allows for versatile use; add to your post-workout protein shake to maximise muscle recovery and growth.

related_products.name: BSN TRUE MASS 1200 4.73KG
related_products.description: BSN True Mass 1200 is called such because it delivers 1200 of nutrient-dense calories that consist of quality protein, plus high-grade carbohydrates. It’s the ultimate mass formula, engineered for the true hard-gainer in need of serious caloric support. Whilst a structured training plan is essential, targeted nutrition is vital. In order to gain size, a positive energy balance is required. The way to achieve this is by ensuring an intake of quality calories which will fuel your success. Food should always be the first port of call, but supplements are designed to help you achieve nutritional balance. Product Highlights Each serving of True Mass 1200 features a 4:1 ratio of protein to carbohydrates, consisting of 50g of BSN’s signature protein blend. Contains 215g of a unique complex carbohydrate blend that includes ground, whole oats. Includes 12g of naturally occurring BCAAs and 25g of EAAs in each scoop. Dietary Fibre, along with MCTs round the overall nutritional value of True Mass 1200. BSN utilises the same flavour technology as applied to Syntha-6, to ensure you enjoy a remarkably rich and satisfying shake.

related_products.name: GRENADE 50 CALIBRE 232G
related_products.description: Grenade .50 Calibre; A hard hitting Pre Workout Devastator designed to make every workout an explosive, energy fuelled assault* Formulated by R&D experts, .50 Calibre contains over 20 university studied ingredients in industry leading dosages,** Grenade .50 Calibre contains large dosages of Citrulline Malate (the most research-supported NO-boosting amino acid), high nitrate Beta Vulgaris, high-dose, flavanol-rich Theobroma Cacao and numerous other effective ingredients that support muscular blood flow. Of course, no pre-workout product would be complete without beta alanine, caffeine and creatine, as they are backed by hundreds ofscientific studies in exercise performance. Additionally, bicarbonate electrolytes are added to resist the energy-sapping effects of lactic acid (lactate) and BCAAs are added for anti-catabolic support. *NOTE: Niacin contributes to normal energy-yielding metabolism, niacin and folic acid contrubute to the reduction in ditedness and fatigue. ** Per maximum serving size

related_products.name: GRENADE BLACK OPS
related_products.description: Black Ops is an elite weight management system developed by the multi award winning R&D team at Grenade and has a unique stimulatory effect, designed to enhance mental and physical performance. Predominantly aimed at male users, Black Ops has a shorter duration of action than the original Grenade Thermo Detonator making it ideal for focused HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training) sessions and for training later in the afternoon or early evening. How it works When you try to solve a complex problem like getting rid of unsightly body fat, you can’t just come at it from just one angle. The body constantly adapts to changes in one or two metabolic pathways. So you have to consider all of the angles. That’s what the Grenade Research Team has done with Black Ops. The first thing you have to do when designing a world-beating fat loss support product is to strive to mobilize fat from fat cells. This is effected by caffeine – a must-have ingredient in any such product. Then, to ensure that the fat gets eliminated (and not just stored back in fat cells), you have to try and find some means to increase the metabolic rate and increase fat oxidation. This may be achieved by green tea … then Cayenne kicks in, in an attempt to assist green tea in ensuring maximum oxidation! Next, there are two other conditions, without which, you simply won’t burn maximum fat – you need to try to influence the right hormones and chemical messengers. This is where Blue green algae and Cocoa Extract come in. Blue green algae contains essential fatty acids and Phenylephrine. Essential fatty acids may be associated with decreased body fat mass and phenylephrine is involved with the body’s primary fat-burning hormone called norepinephrine. This may get the body’s primary signalling molecules – hormones – on your side. Finally, the icing on the cake is Cocoa Extract’s potential effect on nitric oxide. Most of us know nitric oxide as a vasodilator and pre-workout booster but studies suggest that it may be involved in fat metabolism also and in fact if it is blocked, the use of fat for energy virtually comes to a halt in the body. Not even satisfied with this five-pronged attack, Grenade Researchers have also added several micronutrients which have been evaluated to be substantially involved in the support of fat-loss metabolism and improvement of insulin function – crucial for properly handling dietary carbs! So while most fat-loss products are satisfied to influence one or two weight loss pathways in the body, Grenade Black Ops is designed to attack virtually all of them!

related_products.name: GRENADE CARB KILLA SHAKE 8X330ML
related_products.description: A smooth and creamy high protein drink with under 200 calories, Carb Killa Shake is seriously indulgent. With 24g of protein and 9g of carbs, Carb Killa Shake is a convenient way to consume additional protein between meals without unwanted calories or carbs.

related_products.name: NAKD GLUTEN FREE BARS 18X35G
related_products.description: These are Nakd’s simplest and most beloved bars. Just raw fruits and nuts smooshed together. Containing 100% natural ingredients with no added sugars or syrups,;these bars are also wheat, dairy and gluten free, and bursting with yummy goodness. With a soft, chewy texture they fill you up till your next meal and most count towards 1 of your 5 a day too. Ideal for lunchboxes, grabbing on the go and refuelling between meals!

related_products.name: OLIMP AAKG EXTREME MEGA CAPS
related_products.description: Arginine is a nutrient, which plays a role in creating the essential gas nitric oxide (NO), along with other constituents within the body. In addition, arginine is required for the biosynthesis of creatine. AAKG Extreme Mega Caps is designed for physically active persons and high-performance athletes. It helps with the production of testosterone which helps boost strength and muscle recovery.

related_products.name: OLIMP BCAA XPLODE 500G
related_products.description: 4…3…2…1…0… Xplode! The greatest knock-out dose of BCAA on the market! as much as 6000 mg of the highest quality BCAA per portion enriched with a perfect dose of L-glutamine! Perfect formula, delicious taste! You have never drunk such delicious amino acids. Do you value the highest quality and effectiveness but the taste also matters a lot to you?
